Our Team

The Minds Behind AeroNovaX

Who We Are

We are a passionate group of Aerospace and Telecommunications Engineering students from the Universitat Polit√®cnica de Catalunya (UPC). Our diverse backgrounds in both aerospace and telecommunications create a unique synergy that allows us to approach aerospace challenges from multiple perspectives.

At UPC's School of Telecommunications and Aerospace Engineering of Castelldefels (EETAC), we combine theoretical knowledge with hands-on experience, working on cutting-edge projects that bridge the gap between academic learning and real-world applications.
